item.title: ABOUT
item.description: Hey there üëãüßë I’m Steffen, a 20 year old CS Student at TUM Working part-time at Rubean My main skillset consists of: Java (Tutor in the courses PGDP & EIDI at TUM WS2020) C & Assembly (x86, SIMD) C# /.NET shell scripting deeper knowledge of GNU/Linux systems DirectX, OpenGL, bits of Vulkan GLSL, HLSL Unity Engine basics of Go & Python Btw, an old blog of mine can be found here.
item.content:
Hey there üëãüßë

I’m Steffen, a 20 year old CS Student at TUM
Working part-time at Rubean

My main skillset consists of:

  • Java (Tutor in the courses PGDP & EIDI at TUM WS2020)
  • C & Assembly (x86, SIMD)
  • C# /.NET
  • shell scripting
  • deeper knowledge of GNU/Linux systems
  • DirectX, OpenGL, bits of Vulkan
  • GLSL, HLSL
  • Unity Engine
  • basics of Go & Python

Btw, an old blog of mine can be found here.

Facts

  • my music taste is all over the place
  • yes, i genuinely enjoy low-level programming
  • big fan of computer graphics
  • in a relationship with the best girl on üåç
  • average coffee enjoyer
  • skyrim belongs neither to the nords, nor the imperials
  • love memes and internet culture

Hardware Tier List

These are my top-notch *cough daily drivers

  1. Elitebook 8470p: this has to be the coolest laptop ever
  2. Mini Desktop: really like the mini-itx format, this one got barely enough power for my applications
  3. Raspberry Pi 3B: running a teamspeak server, telegram bot and various api stuff. Entirely powered by solar power of my balcony grid system.
  4. Another mini-itx machine, this time a minecraft server for the bois and me
  5. Rarely used ancient gaming machine with an i5 2320 and a GTX 970

I lost count of how many computers I own. I started collecting and tinkering around them since I was a kid. Pretty sure I got at least 10 more systems scattered around my place.

(2)
